suite.name: Cadastro Perfil

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: Cenário 3 - Cadastro sem campo obrigatório "Data de Nascimento"

kw.name: Dado que estou na tela "Cadastrar perfil de usuário inteligente"
Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
Valida que estou na tela de cadastro de perfil de usuário inteligente

kw.name: Quando o usuário preenche o campo "Nome completo" com @NOME_COMPLETO
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Luiz Henrique de Andrade Gonçalves' into text field 'id=nome'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E insere sua impressão digital validada no leitor biométrico
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: E preenche o campo "Preferências de Navegação"
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Google Chrome, Edge, Mozilla, Firefox' into text field 'id=preferenciasNavegacao'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E carrego uma foto no campo "Foto de Perfil"
Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into the file input field ``locator``.

kw.name: E seleciono um idioma no campo "Preferência de Idioma"
Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=idioma' by value es.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: E seleciono um nível de privacidade no campo "Nível de Privacidade"
Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=privacidade' by value medio.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: E marco a opção "Consentimento para Coleta de Dados"
Run Keyword And Return Status
Checkbox Should Be Selected
kw.msg: Checkbox 'id=consentimento' should have been selected but was not.
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is selected/checked.
kw.status: Checkbox 'id=consentimento' should have been selected but was not.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então valido que recebi o alerta de "Preencha este campo."
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

suite.doc: Acessa os campos da tela e valida o cadastro de usuário
